title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Inspiration is hiding in plain sight today. You can find it in the way the wind moves through the branches of the trees and the carefree travel of the clouds through the sky. The rivers are awash with creativity; even the birds and critters seem eager to share simple wisdom in their chatter and actions. It is when you are busy appreciating nature that a brilliant insight is most likely to creep up on you. And once it does, you might wonder what took you so long to spot it. Philosopher George Santayana wrote, The Earth has its music for those who will listen. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
